channel.title: 1 Problem And 1 Error. Can It Get Worse..?
channel.description: Well, I got Mod Taharoks 'Perfect Compiler' and i appear to have only 1 Error as shown below.. [IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/7739/mwsnap004hz3.png[/img] BUT Now we go on to the 'Problem' , When i go on my server and i attack another player , using mage,range or melee, I always Disconnect and then i have to restart the server..Wich meens i can't pk on it till i get it fixed, anyone any ideas?

item.title: 1 Problem And 1 Error. Can It Get Worse..?
item.dc:creator: @X_Val_X X Val X
item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:6, topic:96256”]Just delete the line that uses specspell.

It’s not like it’ll be anything useful.[/quote]

Well, what exactly is it? lol[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 11:52:37 AM[/size][hr]I just tryed to fix it , but still no success ,

got any ideas?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 05:56:55 PM[/size][hr]Yipee!! I fixed BOTH! on my own now i dont disconnect when i attack, specs work, and i can compile. What could be better?

Read full topic
item.source: 1 Problem And 1 Error. Can It Get Worse..?

item.description:

Hiaburi:

declare specspell with 12 ints…

K then …Could someone tell me how i fix it, Being more specific.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 11:08:00 AM[/size][hr]Could someone (if they know) post what its suppose to look like or something please.
